00225 #define A4L_RNG_UNIT(x) (x & (A4L_RNG_VOLT_UNIT |       \
00226                               A4L_RNG_MAMP_UNIT |       \
00227                               A4L_RNG_NO_UNIT |         \
00228                               A4L_RNG_EXT_UNIT))

00241         long max; 
00242         unsigned long flags; 
00243 };

00250                         A4L_RNG_NO_UNIT}

00291         }

00298         .mode = A4L_RNG_GLOBAL_RNGDESC,         \
00299         .length =  1,                           \
00300         .rngtabs = {&(x)}, }
